description: This Java class configures OpenAPI documentation and customizes Swagger UI with a specific Ocean Professional theme, defining API information and styling.

classes.name: OpenApiConfig
classes.description: Configuration class defining OpenAPI metadata and Swagger UI styling customization.

methods.name: baseOpenAPI
methods.description: Creates and returns an OpenAPI object with specific API info and external documentation.

methods.name: swaggerIndexTransformer
methods.description: Returns a transformer that injects custom CSS styles into Swagger UI HTML for theming.
